thread.title: Fifteen Million Dollars Revenue Projected

title: Fifteen Million Dollars Revenue Projected
text: Ad Exchange Business for sale. $500,000 Will include 20% of another ad exchange business with $15 Million dollars in projected revenue Ad Exchange, Ad Network, real time bidding, rtb, Optimizers, demand side platform, dsp. Ad Serving for Display social, video, apps and Mobile.... Ad Server Solutions is an established business with name recognition, established reputation, high profitability, and tremendous market growth potential. This business is a leader in the ad management and mobile ad network. We provide automated self service technology solutions, ad exchange software for display and mobile, rtb platforms for display and mobile. Licensing, source code, saas It would cost over $6 million dollars to develop the software alone. We have spent over a decade building, developing, marketing and selling these products which are in high demand worldwide Ad Exchange - Ad Server - Ad Network - Mobile ad exchange- RTB - real time bidding - demand side platform - Advertising Technology Business for sale Financials Gross Revenues: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow Type: Sellers Discretionary Cash Seller Financing: Not Disclosed
